title: Big Bang
description: The universe began from a singularity, exploding into existence with all space, time, and matter.

title: First Stars
description: The earliest stars form, lighting up the universe for the first time.

title: Formation of the Solar System
description: Our solar system, including the Sun and Earth, begins to take shape from a cloud of gas and dust.

title: Modern Astronomy
description: Humanity begins exploring the universe with telescopes, satellites, and deep-space missions.
